export var LOADING_SPINNER_OPEN_WITH_OPTIONS="LOADING_SPINNER_OPEN_WITH_OPTIONS";export var LOADING_SPINNER_OPEN="LOADING_SPINNER_OPEN";export var LOADING_SPINNER_CLOSE="LOADING_SPINNER_CLOSE";//To open loading component with options - default -> loading = true, text = "Loading", size = "default"
export var handleLoadingSpinnerOpenWithOptions=function handleLoadingSpinnerOpenWithOptions(){var loading=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:true;var text=arguments.length>1&&arguments[1]!==undefined?arguments[1]:"Loading";var size=arguments.length>2&&arguments[2]!==undefined?arguments[2]:"default";return function(dispatch){dispatch({type:LOADING_SPINNER_OPEN_WITH_OPTIONS,payload:{loading:loading,text:text,size:size}});};};//To open loading component
export var handleLoadingSpinnerOpen=function handleLoadingSpinnerOpen(){return function(dispatch){dispatch({type:LOADING_SPINNER_OPEN});};};//To close loading component
export var handleLoadingSpinnerClose=function handleLoadingSpinnerClose(){return function(dispatch){dispatch({type:LOADING_SPINNER_CLOSE});};};
